title: Choosing Forgiveness, Even When It's Hard
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Leslie Vernick
itunes:summary:
When your spouse hurts you, your knee-jerk reaction might be to hold on tightly to unforgiveness. But choosing not to forgive can cause even more damage to your relationship. John, Erin and Greg weigh in on why forgiveness can set your marriage free from resentment.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Leslie Vernick's book "How to Act Right When Your Spouse Acts Wrong" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2020-11-17?refcd=1046803
